data.text: @WelshGovernment @PublicHealthW Vaccine has been approved for 5-12s but no sign of it being rolled out yet. Any clue when this might happen?

@WelshGovernment @PublicHealthW Why bother to publish these so often, when the changes are so small. I know Drakeford doesn't like to see people sat about doing nothing but surely there is something more worthwhile you could be doing or is this another job created because of covid?
@WelshGovernment @PublicHealthW Can you drop this bollocks now please.
@WelshGovernment @PublicHealthW Can you explain why the isolation rules are different for the unvaccinated when both jabbed & unjabbed can catch & spread Covid
@WelshGovernment @PublicHealthW Why don't you lot get lost and leave us alone.
